wikipedia_page.main: Kenneth George Plant (15 August 1925 – 22 March 2014) was an English professional footballer who played as a centre-forward in The Football League for Bury and Colchester United. Plant also made appearances for hometown club Nuneaton Borough and Atherstone Town in the non-leagues.

link_mentions.page: List of Colchester United F.C. seasons

response: Fenton's side played an exciting attacking game. They scored 76 goals in the league, with Kevin McCurley scoring a club Football League best total of 29 goals, and strike partner Ken Plant scoring 17. Both players notched two hat-tricks each during the season as the club safely finished the campaign in 12th-place.
* 22 March 2014: Ken Plant, 88, former Bury and Colchester United centre forward.
*Ken Plant, 88, English footballer (Nuneaton Borough, Colchester United).Former Nuneaton Town, Bury and Colchester United striker Ken Plant has died, aged 88
